regen.absent_element: deactivation of visual and audible alert after call termination
regen.new_specification: The system shall deactivate the visual and audible alert in the cab upon termination of the Railway emergency call.

regen.absent_element: termination of the visual and audible alert
regen.new_specification: The system shall terminate the visual and audible alert in the cab when the Railway emergency call is terminated.
The system shall terminate the Railway emergency call when explicitly terminated by the driver.

label: Once the call is terminated, the continuous visual alarm indication in the cab shall cease.
